text: Groslée-Saint-Benoît is a commune in the Ain department of east France, in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region. The municipality started on January 1, 2016 when two communes, Groslée and Saint-Benoît, joined together.Arrêté préfectoral 30 December 2015 ==Related pages== *Communes of the Ain department ==References== Category:2016 establishments in France
title: Groslée-Saint-Benoît
